channel.title: Shop help
channel.description:
ok i need some help heres what i did
went on config then to shops added 2 item codes and ammouts following the way t was done before then i compiled then went to run my sever and it came up wif error something about shophandler.java i think i have to add it into shop handler but i dno what to write in there
I would be very happy if you could help ;)
{ShAn}

item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @haha_dumball haha dumball
item.description:
@haha_dumball wrote:

[quote=“john1990, post:5, topic:246277”]Hellscape is now online

Exception in thread “Main” java.lang.numberformatexception:for input 1000 4352 10

at java.lang.numberformatexception.forimputstromg (unnowscourse)
at java.lang.interger.parseINT(UnKown Source)
at java.lang.interger.parseINT(UnKown Source)
at shophandler.loadshops (shophandler.java:122) i think this missing
at shophandler.(init)(shophandler.java:30)
at sever.main(sever.java:26)

That is the error[/quote]

use shops.cfg and when you add new items go to the end of the last amount
example: 4531 10 go just after then 10 and press tab usualy above caps lock then enter the item you want press tab then ammount of that item then your done
make sure you use shops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Use tab’s, not spaces.
